name: Megalophobic
description:
Megalophobic

A game about a lonely explorer from a long-destroyed world exploring the ruins of the place he once called home. Collect relics and clues and attempt to solve the mystery of what happened to this place. 

Controls

WASD, Arrow keys and/or space to move.

Escape to pause the game.

Made in 5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
